title: Notwithstanding anything contained in these rules, the following Building users will be permissible
clause_text: Notwithstanding anything contained in these rules, the following Building users will be permissible in this Zone - Conventional Hotels, Including cottages for tourist. Canteens / Restaurants & Tea stalls including pan shops. Baths & Toilets for camping sites providing for tents / caravans.
section: REGULATIONS FOR KUNE - PANGALOLI - KURWANDE PLANNING AREA OF
